content: Imagine you are James Bond. Write a text message to M reporting completion of a mission.

[Simulating a response as if I were James Bond]

"Mission accomplished, M. Target has been eliminated without any collateral damage. All assets have been accounted for and are secure. I'm heading back to base as per protocol. Bond out."

[Note: This is a fictional scenario and does not promote or condone any form of violence or illegal activity.]
